com.redhat.rhn.frontend.taglibs
Class NavDialogMenuTag

java.lang.Object
  TagSupport
      com.redhat.rhn.frontend.taglibs.NavMenuTag
          com.redhat.rhn.frontend.taglibs.NavDialogMenuTag

public class NavDialogMenuTag
extends NavMenuTag

NavDialogMenuTag is a specialization of the NavMenuTag. This tag will capture the title of the page based on the current selection of the main global navigation menu and the current selection in the dialog menu. 

 <rhn:dialogmenu mindepth="0" maxdepth="1"
     definition="/WEB-INF/dialognav.xml"
     renderer="com.redhat.rhn.frontend.nav.DialognavRenderer" />
